Package com.example.goldencarrot

Class EntrantHomeViewTest

java.lang.Object
com.example.goldencarrot.EntrantHomeViewTest
public class EntrantHomeViewTest extends Object
EntrantHomeViewTest will test if the EntrantHomeView will open up all its navagatability by clicking all the buttons

    testNavigateToEditProfile will verify that we are able to go from EntrantHomeView to EditUserDetailsView by long clicking on the profile image
